metadata.title: CVE-2014-5267 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: modules/openid/xrds.inc in Drupal 6.x before 6.33 and 7.x before 7.31allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted DOCTYPEdeclaration in an XRDS document.

criterions.comment: drupal7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
